text: Kharar Assembly Constituency (Sl. No.: 52) is a Punjab Legislative Assembly constituency in Sahibzada Ajit Singh Nagar district, Punjab state, India. Kanwar Sandhu of the Aam Aadmi Party is the incumbent MLA. ==References== Category:Assembly constituencies of Punjab, India Category:Sahibzada Ajit Singh Nagar district
title: Kharar Assembly Constituency
